name: Circuitous ®
description: Circuitous ® is an addictive, ludicrous-speed arcade-style puzzler. Avoid rotating barriers as you attempt to navigate to the center.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Quard Core Intel or AMD Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Standard
